name: Don't Drop the Baby
description:
Test your reflexes and smile areas in this silly parenting adventure

*NOTE

For anyone having an issue juggling the baby, try hitting the baby as close to the bottom as possible. Keep in mind, where you hit the baby will also change the angle. If you come from the top you're just gonna spike him right into the ground.

For hiscores, try juggling it from side to side and use that sexy screen wrap.

* LATEST VERSION AVAILABLE HERE

https://willstall.github.io/DontDropTheBaby/
